Articles.Content:
A very interesting page with optical images of the Apollo spacecraft, en route to and from the M**oo**n. (the best photos are the earlier ones): [http://www.astr.ua.edu/keel/space/apollo.html](http://www.astr.ua.edu/keel/space/apollo.html) Do you remember 'From the Earth to the Moon', and the 48000x telescope on the Rocky Mountains to track the projectile of the Columbiad? ![;)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)

Looking forward to seeing similar stuff in KSP, maybe ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

Wow, that\'s great.

I hope KSP will have telescopes in the future so we can spy on our spacecrafts. ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)
